name: FOR YOUR MALICE
description:
The title For Your Malice comes from one of the tracklist from As The Palaces Burn albums by Lamb Of God.
Actually this image has nothing to do with the song and not intended to interpret the song from Lamb of God. This image is a collection of several objects that are not related at all but are drawn using pointillism or dotting techniques, and are colorized as freely as possible.
It takes 3 weeks to finished the artwork dot by dot, using adobe illustrator (manually dotted but using digital equipment) and colored with adobe photshop.

JPEG : 5315 px X 5315 px
